ui_control.label: Are you using Oracle Real application cluster (RAC)?

ui_control.label: How many nodes are in Oracle RAC?

ui_control.name: db_load_balancer
ui_control.label: Are you using database services for load balancing?

ui_control.name: asm_flex_server
ui_control.label: Are you using Automatic Storage Management (ASM)/ ASM Flex cluster?

ui_control.name: app_rac_aware
ui_control.label: Are you sure application connecting to database are fully RAC aware and node eviction/crash is completely seamless, including DML operation gets successful?

ui_control.name: app_use_fan
ui_control.label: Are the application using FAN event subscription in connection pool?

ui_control.name: oracle_clustware_used
ui_control.label: Is Oracle Clusterware used for managing application/service other than database services as well?

ui_control.name: use_default_auto_gather
ui_control.label: Are you using default Auto Gather jobs for statistic collection?

ui_control.name: special_method_gather_stat
ui_control.label: Have you implemented any special method to gather stats other than auto gather jobs?

ui_control.name: db_level_trigger
ui_control.label: Are there any trigger at Database level (Log on etc.)?
